---
title: "Growth Rate Modeling"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(brms)
```

```{r}
anther <- read_csv("../input/Antherelongation2017.csv")
anther
```

```{r}
anther <- anther %>% rename(day=Day, trt=Treatment, time=Time, length=`Length (mm)`)
anther %>% mutate(trt=as.factor(trt)) %>% skim()
unique(anther$trt)
```

```{r}
table(anther$Day, anther$floret)
```

```{r}
table(anther$Day, anther$Time)
```

```{r}
anther %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=time, y=length, color=trt, shape=as.character(floret))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~day)
```

```{r}
anther %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=time, y=length, color=trt)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~day)
```

```{r}
anther %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=time, y=length, color=trt)) +
  geom_smooth()
```
